l1_part2_questions.question:
Describe your perfect job. You should say:
What it is
Where you heard about it
What you need to learn to get the job
And explain why you think it is your perfect job.
l1_part2_questions.model_answer:
I'd like to describe my dream of becoming a university professor, which I believe is a very Prestigious [有声望的] and Fulfilling [令人满足的] career. I first learned about this role from my own teachers, who seemed to have found their Dream job [理想工作]. To get this job, one must be highly Qualified [有资格的], usually requiring a PhD. Since the work is intellectually [智力上地] Challenging [充满挑战的], it requires one to be Adaptable [适应性强的] to new research methods. Although it is Demanding [要求高的], it is a great way to Make a living [谋生] and can be quite Lucrative [利润丰厚的] at the top level. I think it is perfect because I want to Climb the career ladder [在职业阶梯上攀升] in academia [学术界].

Brainstorming Ideas:
- Job: Teacher / Doctor
- Where: School / Hospital
- Learn: Books / Science
- Why: Help / Respect

l1_part2_questions.question:
Describe a job you would like to have in the future. You should say:
What the job is
What qualifications are required
Whether it is a popular job
And explain why this job appeals to you.
l1_part2_questions.model_answer:
I'm going to talk about becoming a software engineer, which is definitely my Dream job [理想工作]. This role is increasingly Prestigious [有声望的] in the tech world. To be Qualified [有资格的], I need to study computer science. It is a very popular and Lucrative [利润丰厚的] way to Make a living [谋生] right now. Even though the coding work can be Demanding [要求高的], I find solving problems to be deeply Fulfilling [令人满足的]. The industry changes fast, so I must be Adaptable [适应性强的]. I love it because it is Challenging [充满挑战的] and offers a chance to Climb the career ladder [在职业阶梯上攀升] quickly.

Brainstorming Ideas:
- Job: Designer / Chef
- Need: Art / Cooking
- Popular: Yes / No
- Why: Fun / Creative

l1_part2_questions.question:
Describe a well-paid job that you would be good at. You should say:
What the job is
What skills you have that match this job
How you would find this job
And explain why you think you would succeed in this role.
l1_part2_questions.model_answer:
I wish to describe the role of a project manager, which is often very Lucrative [利润丰厚的]. I am Qualified [有资格的] because I am organized and Adaptable [适应性强的] in Challenging [充满挑战的] situations. I would find this Prestigious [有声望的] job through networking [社交/建立人脉] to Make a living [谋生]. Because I enjoy leading teams, I would find the Demanding [要求高的] nature of the work Fulfilling [令人满足的] rather than stressful. It is not just a Dream job [理想工作] but a real opportunity to Climb the career ladder [在职业阶梯上攀升] based on my skills, leading to great success in the future. I am ready to start.

Brainstorming Ideas:
- Job: Lawyer / Manager
- Skills: Talking / Leading
- Find: Internet / Friends
- Success: Hard work

l2_part3_questions.question: What jobs do children want to do when they grow up?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] Generally speaking, children often desire visible roles like astronauts or doctors. [Reason] They are influenced by media and desire Prosperous [繁荣的] lives, hoping to Bring home the bacon [养家糊口] successfully without worrying about money. [Example] Unless they understand the Work-life balance [工作与生活的平衡] required, they might not realize the Motivation [动力] needed for such careers. They need guidance [指导].
idea_suggestions: Opinion: Creative jobs. Reason: Fun and freedom. Example: YouTuber or Artist.

l2_part3_questions.question: What should people consider when choosing jobs?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] I strongly believe that one should weigh Job security [工作保障] against passion to avoid a Dead-end job [没前途的工作] later in life. [Reason] High Unemployment [失业] rates make stability [稳定性] crucial in today's unpredictable economy, so we must be careful. [Example] Provided that the salary is decent, a secure job offers better mental peace than a risky venture [冒险/风险项目]. Stability [稳定性] is key.
idea_suggestions: Opinion: Personal interest. Reason: Long-term satisfaction. Example: Choosing charity work over banking.

l2_part3_questions.question: Is salary the main reason people choose a certain job?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] It seems to me that while money matters, Work-life balance [工作与生活的平衡] is increasingly important for happiness. [Reason] A Prosperous [繁荣的] life isn't just about cash or trying to Bring home the bacon [养家糊口]. [Example] Although a high salary provides Motivation [动力], many people quit high-paying jobs to avoid burnout [职业倦怠] and stress. Health comes first.
idea_suggestions: Opinion: Career growth. Reason: Future potential. Example: Taking a lower starting salary for better training.

l2_part3_questions.question: What kind of jobs are well-paid?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] Undoubtedly [毫无疑问地], jobs requiring specialized skills are the most Prosperous [繁荣的] and respected. [Reason] Roles in tech and medicine have high barriers to entry and require you to Think outside the box [跳出框框思考] daily to solve complex problems. [Example] Since Automation [自动化] cannot replace surgeons easily, their Job security [工作保障] and pay remain very high. Expertise is valued.
idea_suggestions: Opinion: Management roles. Reason: High responsibility. Example: CEOs of large companies.

l2_part3_questions.question: Do people's ideal jobs change as they grow up?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] Unquestionably [毫无疑问地], yes. As we age, our Motivation [动力] shifts from seeking fame to seeking stability [稳定性] and peace. [Reason] We realize the importance of Job security [工作保障] and avoid ending up in a Dead-end job [没前途的工作]. [Example] When reality hits, dreams of being a rock star often fade into more practical career choices. We become realistic.
idea_suggestions: Opinion: Yes, due to reality. Reason: Discovering true skills. Example: Realizing you aren't good at sports.

l2_part3_questions.question: To what extent does technology (such as AI) threaten traditional job roles in modern society?
l2_part3_questions.model_answer: [Opinion] I am convinced that Automation [自动化] poses a significant threat to routine jobs globally. [Reason] It causes Unemployment [失业] and contributes to Brain drain [人才流失] as skilled workers leave for better hubs. [Example] While it improves efficiency, it forces workers to retrain and Think outside the box [跳出框框思考] to maintain their Job security [工作保障]. We must adapt.
idea_suggestions: Opinion: Creates new jobs. Reason: Tech needs maintenance. Example: AI trainers and robot repair technicians.
